name: Financial Future
goal: The Financial Future is an independent, not-for-profit membership-based discussion platform that hosts 9-10 workshops and other ad hoc events each year in Brussels on EU financial services issues and legislative proposals. Our meetings bring together a range of speakers from the EU institutions, industry and non-governmental organisations to facilitate a constructive dialogue on the regulation of the financial sector. The Financial Future does not do any lobbying or take positions on any of the issues it discusses.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Financial services policy including Markets in Financial Instruments Directive, European Market Infrastructure Regulation, Capital Markets Union, ESAs, Capital requirements regulation/ directives, cumulative impact of financial regulation, fintech
